author: kolbyml
content:
The specification for Ethereum History and State Archival formats based off of e2store will be stored in this repo going forward <https://github.com/eth-clients/e2store-format-specs>

The repo will serve 3 main functions
- Specifying e2store based formats, currently we specify `era`, `era1`, and `e2ss` with `e2hs` and `erb` soon to be added
- Documenting `Entry Types` since the entry type id's should be unique amongst e2store entry's
- A place to share libraries for using `e2store` formats. Currently we have the one in Rust listed, but I am assuming status's, nethermind's and geth's implementations can be listed soon as well?
